autoplot method for mic_solve objects — autoplot.mic_solve
code: if (requireNamespace("ordinal", quietly = TRUE) &&     requireNamespace("ggplot2", quietly = TRUE)) {   df <- data.frame(score  = ordered(sample(0:4, 120, TRUE)),                    conc   = runif(120, 0, 4),                    strain = factor(sample(c("A","B"), 120, TRUE)))   fit <- ordinal::clm(score ~ strain * log1p(conc), data = df)   res <- mic_solve(fit, expand.grid(strain = levels(df$strain)),                    conc_name = "conc")   ggplot2::autoplot(res, type = "mic") } #> Warning: NaNs produced
